price: (27) Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.[1583]
arabic: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ
footnotes: [1583]- This and the following verse are an address to Ṣāliḥ (upon him be peace).

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innā mur'silū al-nāqati fit'natan lahum fa-ir'taqib'hum wa-iṣ'ṭabir
